text: Unhon ney farmaya kay bus abb tum per Allah ki taraf say azab aur ghazab aaya hi chahata hai kiya tum mujh say aisay naamon kay baab mein jhagartay ho jin ko tum ney aur tumharay baap dadon ney thehra liya hai? Unn kay mabood honey ko Allah ney koi daleel nahi bheji. So tum muntazir raho mein bhi tumharay sath intizar ker raha hun
